module.name: mailjet
module.displayName: Official Mailjet Email Add-on for PrestaShop
module.description: Boost your ROI and increase your merchant revenue with the Mailjet PrestaShop plugin! Create, send and analyze your transactional and email marketing campaigns straight from within your PrestaShop acc
module.description_full: Boost your ROI and increase your merchant revenue with the Mailjet PrestaShop plugin! Create, send and analyze your transactional and email marketing campaigns straight from within your PrestaShop account. Be careful - this version of Mailjet’s add-on is compatible with only Mailjet v3 users.  If you are a v1 user (any account created before April 2014), please request to get your account migrated via https://www.mailjet.com/support/ticket.
module.additional_description: With Mailjet, optimise your  deliverability,  get your emails delivered to the inbox and avoid the spam folder. Install the official Mailjet PrestaShop add-on and get access to:   ROI Stats:  Real-time sales and net revenue figures per marketing newsletter. Find out who opened, clicked, bounced or unsubscribed from your mailings, create graphs, export data and much more   Setup triggered email events based on customer behavior (birthday promo, abandoned cart, survey request, …)   Group and create specific customer segments  to send targeted  content to thus increasing engagement and  open rates   Automatically remove unsubscribers from your contact lists and Newsletter list to keep your deliverability reputation intact   Personalize your mailings with any contact list properties   Create & manage all Mailjet campaigns and contacts directly within PrestaShop

module.name: ganalytics
module.description: Your customers go everywhere; shouldn't your analytics? Google Analytics shows you the full customer picture across ads and videos, websites and social tools, tablets and smartphones
module.description_full: Your customers go everywhere; shouldn't your analytics? Google Analytics shows you the full customer picture across ads and videos, websites and social tools, tablets and smartphones. That makes it easier to serve your current customers and win new ones.   Sign up now!
module.additional_description: An ad click here, a page view there, a video watched on a tablet before bed... but which one clinched the sale? Google Analytics has the latest in full-credit measurement, so you see all the stops people take on the road to action. The result: a measurable way to improve campaigns and reach new audiences as they go through their days.

module.name: avalaratax
module.description: Avalara is a leading provider of sales tax automation software. We help you manage the complex rules and regulations related to transactional and indirect taxes
module.description_full: Avalara is a leading provider of sales tax automation software. We help you manage the complex rules and regulations related to transactional and indirect taxes.   Avalara’s cloud-hosted solutions streamline and simplify the complicated and burdensome process of managing tax-related compliance activities and integrate with 300+ leading accounting, ERP and ecommerce systems.
module.additional_description: Fast. Eliminates the tedious work and complexity that goes into manually calculating and reporting sales taxes. Secure. The transaction takes place via a secure, encrypted Internet connection. Easy. Integrates seamlessly with existing business systems. Accurate. Continuously updates data, making accurate sales tax calculations available immediately. Affordable. Scalable, usage-based, Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) delivery model

PrestaShop and First Data have teamed up as industry leaders to help your business save money in online payment acceptance. With over 40 years of payment processing experience, Express Merchant Processing Solutions (EMPS) — powered by First Data has helped millions of businesses like yours bring fast, secure, effortless payments to their customers and affordable support—regardless of size.

module.name: prediggo
module.description: Through this module, Prediggo is offering you the possibility to increase your conversion rate by 30%. How? Sell Smarter
module.description_full: Through this module, Prediggo is offering you the possibility to increase your conversion rate by 30%. How? Sell Smarter. ﻿   Enjoy 1-month free trial now with the promo code FREEMERCH14 !
module.additional_description: Both solutions require a fee. Do not hesitate to contact us for a quotation.   High performance have been proven by A/B testingOur patented semantic technology represents the next generation in e-merchandising. It powers the selling strategies that increase sales by 30% through increased conversion and average order value.   Prediggo is a flexible solution that is easy-to-useOur intuitive back-office makes it easy to automate and optimise the most complex merchandising !   Only a few days integration neededPrediggo is the only “complete” solution that does not require integration with your ERP, Cookies or Javascript. Our solutions work on a data export, so they integrate in days, not weeks.    A superior serviceSince we started in 2008, customer service has been one of our core values. So it is no wonder that our customer's have reported a 100% satisfaction rate in our 2012 and 2013 surveys!

module.description: Shopgate allows you to get a mobile site for your store as well as iOS and Android Apps! Our solution is recommended by PrestaShop as it is perfectly integrated with your system through a simple plugi
module.description_full: Shopgate allows you to get a mobile site for your store as well as iOS and Android Apps! Our solution is recommended by PrestaShop as it is perfectly integrated with your system through a simple plugin.  Integrating your shop takes a few hours with no investment! Benefit now from PrestaShop special offer to create your account! For the US
module.additional_description: This is the fastest way for your customers to find what they seek. With Shopgate, your mobile visitors will become customers: fast loading, optimised for touch screens, clear navigation, optimal mobile payment methods, SEO and branch locator with GPS.

module.name: simplifycommerce
module.description: Simplify Commerce, an online payment solution, features a low, flat rate with no extra fees, two-day funding and major brand acceptance. Sign up takes minutes
module.description_full: Simplify Commerce, an online payment solution, features a low, flat rate with no extra fees, two-day funding and major brand acceptance. Sign up takes minutes. With easy PrestaShop installation, your business can start selling right away.   SIGN UP
module.additional_description: Built by MasterCard, a global leader in the payment industry, our merchants benefit from: Fast merchant signup in minutes Simple, flat 2.85% + 30₵ rate provided by acquirer with no hidden fees Omni-channel payment solution for website, mobile and eCommerce store Accepting major card brands Quick two-day funding Highest Level 1 PCI certification

module.name: prestastats
module.description: PrestaStats is the leading Business Analytics dashboard & Abandoned Carts Monitor enabling you to see business critical data from your PrestaShop store on any device, at any time, and as far back
module.description_full: PrestaStats is the leading Business Analytics dashboard & Abandoned Carts Monitor enabling you to see business critical data from your PrestaShop store on any device, at any time, and as far back as your Prestashop store has been running.   Sign up now!
module.additional_description: Know what’s happening on your PrestaShop store at any moment, from any device. PrestaStats gives you the power to drive your business to success with an easy to use, clutter free dashboard, that displays your most critical business data, in a visual and consolidated way.
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: yousticeresolutionsystem
module.description: Youstice is a revolutionary way for companies to handle complaints. Companies and customers communicate via an application that engages with a friendly structured dialogue
module.description_full: Youstice is a revolutionary way for companies to handle complaints. Companies and customers communicate via an application that engages with a friendly structured dialogue. The claim is resolved in a couple of clicks, time is saved and customer’s loyalty increased.
module.additional_description: Youstice is a new-generation multilingual online tool, delivering fast and fair solutions to customer complaints all over the world. It helps companies seamlessly communicate and handle claims - both within countries and cross-border.   Through Youstice, in just a couple of clicks, both sides can communicate and negotiate directly, getting issues resolved within minutes. The process is standardized, automated and sophisticated, as it provides options for a constructive dialogue between the consumer and retailer. If no agreement can be reached, Youstice offers the option to have the complaint reviewed by a neutral third-party professional, by mutual agreement, for a quick and fair decision.   By resolving complaints rapidly and fairly retailers become trusted sellers, gain loyal customers, prevent negative feedback and make clients more engaged.   Watch our video and visit our website for more information.   Benefits Connect with your customers and increase their loyalty – thanks to a personalized approach to customer complaints You save time- solving a complaint takes just a couple of clicks You minimize negative reviews and prevent customers from posting future ones by resolving their complaints quickly and efficiently You get help with international expansion – you will get an access to our ecosystem of interconnected online markets, consumer organizations, trustmarks and ODR (Online Dispute Resolution) providers
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: erpillicopresta
module.description: Save time on e-shop management with the 1st free and adaptable ERP: Client orders, Shipping, Suppliers, Stock management and export, Inventory, and more
module.description_full: Save time on e-shop management with the 1st free and adaptable ERP: Client orders, Shipping, Suppliers, Stock management and export, Inventory, and more.   Create your account and explore your personalised Prestashop ERP
module.additional_description: When it comes to added professionalism for the management of your client and supplier orders, advanced configuration of your supplier forms, or even managing and exporting your stock and running your inventory, the 1-Click ERP pack will be your preferred assistant to help you manage your store in a simple, efficient way! Managing your back-office will no longer be a problem! The 1-Click ERP pack will save you precious time in managing your e-commerce: Up to 2h per day, according to the merchants who use it!
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: loyaltylion
module.description: Add a loyalty program to your store in minutes. Show customers they’re valued and increase sales by rewarding referrals, purchases, signups, reviews and visits
module.description_full: Add a loyalty program to your store in minutes. Show customers they’re valued and increase sales by rewarding referrals, purchases, signups, reviews and visits. You decide what to reward and how to reward it for example, 100 points for signups, 5 points per $1 spent and 1000 points per referral. Customers collect points and redeem them for vouchers to spend at your store. Gain customer insights like biggest refers and top spenders. Customise the design and text to match your store.   Sign Up Now!
module.additional_description: Increase basket size on average 9.4% Increase sales via repeat purchases Acquire new customers using our refer a friend feature Increase customer happiness Differentiate your store from your competitors Reach 1000s on social networks - read case study of a store who reached more than 10,000 people in 3 months. Why us?   LoyaltyLion is trusted by hundreds of ecommerce stores around the world. From small and medium sized stores to the largest in Europe.
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: sellstrom
module.description: Simplify your shipping process and save money.  PrestaShop and Sellstrom Global Shipping have partnered to offer you a fast and efficient solution to your shipping needs
module.description_full: Simplify your shipping process and save money.  PrestaShop and Sellstrom Global Shipping have partnered to offer you a fast and efficient solution to your shipping needs. Our module simplifies your shipping process by automatically creating your shipping labels.  Your customers choose the desired carrier and service from our multicarrier platform -- USPS, UPS, FedEx and DHL services.  Once your customer completes their order, the shipping label is automatically created and available for you to print within the order section of your PrestaShop Store.  Completely automated and hassle free!!!
module.additional_description: Your customers choose from 4 carriers – USPS, UPS, FedEx, DHL. Full USPS service selection Save time and reduce errors.  The shipping label is auto created from the customer order Domestic or international shipments Rate customization Try the SGS Module for the 1st month for free.  The module is $39.95 per month
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: nostotagging
module.description: Increase your conversion rate and average order value by delivering your customers personalized product recommendations throughout their shopping journey
module.description_full: Increase your conversion rate and average order value by delivering your customers personalized product recommendations throughout their shopping journey.
module.additional_description: Increase your conversion rate and average order value by delivering your customers personalized product recommendations throughout their shopping journey. Nosto allows you to deliver every customer a personalized shopping experience through recommendations based on their unique user behavior - increasing conversion, average order value and customer retention as a result. Nosto’s offering for PrestaShop merchants is unique: it's extremely easy setup and real-time product recommendations are unlike anything PrestaShop merchants have had access to before. You only need give the module a few days to learn the user behavior on your site. Our pricing model scales as you do. With no minimum spend or commitments, we tie our success to yours, taking only a small % of the revenue we help you generate. Install Nosto for FREE in minutes, and join over 4000 retailers across the globe using Nosto to grow their business and delight their customers!   Increase Online Sales and enable customers to enjoy online shopping! Increase Average Order Value with Cross- and Up-sell recommendations Boost Conversion Rate with relevant product recommendations Learn more about your customers through a real-time dashboard view Pay only a small % of the revenue Nosto helps you generate!
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: powatag
module.description: At Powa, we’re working with PrestaShop to revolutionize customers buying behavior
module.description_full: At Powa, we’re working with PrestaShop to revolutionize customers buying behavior. By adding PowaTag to your e-commerce platform you can offer customers a streamlined checkout experience. Create a free account now!
module.additional_description: Thanks to PowaTag, you will be able to: • Increase your mobile and online conversion rates • Allow customers to purchase straight from your product pages • Enable customers to download your catalogue and purchase at their leisure from their mobile • Experience an omni-channel solution that truly opens up new sales channels, generating new revenue for you PowaTag: The one-stop shop for retailers and brands. See the video below:
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: olark
module.description: Olark live chat is the easiest way to boost your sales, help solve issues and understand your customers
module.description_full: Olark live chat is the easiest way to boost your sales, help solve issues and understand your customers. Give your customers the answers they need immediately and gain powerful insights about what they want for relationships that last.   Sign up now!
module.additional_description: Easily chat with your customers and make the sale! Targeted Chat rules to interact only with the customers that perform certain actions Customize the design to match your website color pallette Advanced Reporting for awesome operator insights Advanced JavaScript API for deeper integrations
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: brinkscheckout
module.description: Brink’s Checkout, a service provided by The Brink’s Company, allows merchants from 200 countries to accept online payments from customers worldwide in multiple currencies and languages in
module.description_full: Brink’s Checkout, a service provided by The Brink’s Company, allows merchants from 200 countries to accept online payments from customers worldwide in multiple currencies and languages in addition to the most widely used payment methods (Visa, MasterCard, Amex, Diners, Discover, JCB, PayPal, and Debit Card). In addition, it comes with a no-cost state-of-the-art fraud prevention. Merchants access all of that with a simple, low-cost, per performance pricing. Sign up Now!
module.additional_description: The all-in-one of payments Get all you need to start accepting payments now: payment gateway and processor, merchant account, fraud prevention and free module. Trust all the way Our transparent checkout combined with our brand gives customers the feeling of trust, safety and certainty. This way they know they are in your website and a secure area, where they can complete their purchase. Maximize conversion The seamless payment experience provides users several different payment options including the ability to pay in several different currencies and languages. Maximize sales With Brink’s Checkout, sell in over 200 countries, using 26 different currencies in 15 different languages. Minimize fraud and have peace-of-mind Brink’s Checkout is the only Checkout platform with over 15 years of experience selling internationally. The patented technology and 300 variables gives merchants the confidence to sell globally in the most convenient and reliable way. Additionally, our fraud specialists review each and every transaction to ensure you have the peace of mind you need to carry on with your business.
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: prestashippingeasy
module.description: ShippingEasy automates your shipping across all major carriers. Orders download in real time and rules streamline carrier, service and package selections
module.description_full: ShippingEasy automates your shipping across all major carriers. Orders download in real time and rules streamline carrier, service and package selections. Quickly fulfill orders placed on your website and marketplaces, including eBay, Amazon, Sears, Newegg and more. An easy to use system backed by exceptional service from shipping specialists. And, the best USPS rates - up to 46% off. FREE starter plan for up to 50 packages a month.   Sign up now!
module.additional_description: Prestashop + ShippingEasy = the right combination for easy, fast, shipping with built-in savings   Sync all your orders in one location Save up to 46% with the best USPS rates Easy carrier integration with USPS, UPS and FedEx FREE starter plan for up to 50 shipments per month Exceptional customer support Prestashop syncs automatically with ShippingEasy, downloading in all your order details in minutes and helping you assign shipping preferences, rates and delivery options in real-time. No cut and paste. No manual update. Save up to 46% Finally, access to competitive USPS rates – in fact, the cheapest around. For example: USPS Priority Mail: Medium Flat Rate box: retail $12.35, our price: $10.65 – a savings of $1.70 on a single shipment. Built in savings! All part of the service.
module.author: Prestashop
